response.original_title: ... und hieß Adam sein Weib Eva
response.overview: Eva Skerstrupp, night nurse at a hospital, 39 years old, raised in a children's home, once divorced and now widowed. She is raising her eight children alone, the youngest of whom is two years old, the others between 13 and 19. Family life is portrayed in small snippets of everyday life.
response.title: ... und hieß Adam sein Weib Eva
